abstract.p: Fashion photo essay by Melvin Sokolsky (L)

block.p: Page 84 Black silk dress, $3,100, by Donna Karan Collection. At Bloomingdale's. Saks Fifth Avenue. Cream linen dress (in window), $1,995, by Miguel Adrover. At Barneys New York. Boots by Manolo Blahnik. Page 85 From left: gold lace shell, $880, by Bruce. At Bergdorf Goodman. Red polyamide lace and leather dress, $7,150. At Christian Dior, 19 east 57th Street.

Page 86 Turquoise and Green chiffon dress, $7,000, by Olivier Theyskens. At Barneys New York. Page 87 Violet silk dress, $2,700, by Donna Karan Collection. At Donna Karan, Manhasset, N.Y. Shoes by Jimmy Choo.

Page 84 Black silk dress, $3,100, by Donna Karan Collection. At Bloomingdale's. Saks Fifth Avenue. Cream linen dress (in window), $1,995, by Miguel Adrover. At Barneys New York. Boots by Manolo Blahnik. Page 85 From left: gold lace shell, $880, by Bruce. At Bergdorf Goodman. Red polyamide lace and leather dress, $7,150. At Christian Dior, 19 east 57th Street.

Page 86 Turquoise and Green chiffon dress, $7,000, by Olivier Theyskens. At Barneys New York. Page 87 Violet silk dress, $2,700, by Donna Karan Collection. At Donna Karan, Manhasset, N.Y. Shoes by Jimmy Choo.
Pages 88 and 89 From left: silver nylon dress, $6,235, by Junya Watanabe. At Comme des Gar-->ons, 520 West 22nd Street. blue viscose dress by Ghost.

Opposite Page Maroon silk dress, $2,520. by special order at Romeo Gigli milan (011-39-02-8310161). Shoes by Sigerson Morrison. this page From left: silver acrylic-blend dress, $2,710, by Thimister by Josephus Thimister. At Jeffrey, 449 West 14th Street. Pink, purple and orange silk dress, $6,850. At Dolce & Gabbana, 825 Madison Avenue. Hair: Peter Savic for Redken. Makeup: Lori Jean Swanson for Cloutier. Manicures: Lisa Jachno for Cloutier/L'Oreal. Fashion Assistant: George Kotsiopoulos. Model: Annie Morton.
